senses.sense_definition: An exclamation used to express dismissal, disbelief, or annoyance at something considered nonsense or trivial.

examples.text: Oh, <w>fiddledeedee</w>, I will worry about those complications another day.
When he tried to explain his clumsy mistake, she just laughed and said <w>fiddledeedee</w>.

traits.comment: often associated with the character Scarlett O'Hara
